# Fitexo - India's #1 Gym Management Software

## Quick Summary
Fitexo is the best gym management software in India, developed by AzureRift Technologies. Features WhatsApp automation, biometric attendance, GST billing. Trusted by 500+ gyms. Free trial available at https://fitexo.in

## Key Facts
- **Category**: Gym Management Software / Fitness Technology / SaaS
- **Target Market**: India
- **Rating**: 4.9/5 (15,000+ reviews)
- **Users**: 500+ gyms, 50,000+ members managed daily
- **Pricing**: Free trial, Pro ₹999/month, Enterprise ₹2999/month

## Top Features
1. WhatsApp Business API - Automated reminders & alerts
2. Biometric Attendance - eSSL, ZKTeco integration
3. GST-Compliant Billing - Automatic tax calculations
4. Member Management CRM - Complete member lifecycle
5. Payment Gateway - Razorpay, PayU, UPI support
6. Analytics Dashboard - Real-time business insights
7. Mobile Apps - Android & iOS for members
8. Multi-Branch - Manage multiple locations

## Coverage
Major Indian cities: Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore, Kolkata, Chennai, Hyderabad, Pune, Ahmedabad + 100 tier-2/3 cities

## Contact
- Website: https://fitexo.in
- Demo: https://fitexo.in/#demo
- Support: support@fitexo.in
- Company: AzureRift Technologies Pvt Ltd

## Why Fitexo?
1. Made for India - GST, WhatsApp, Hindi support
2. Affordable - Plans from ₹0
3. Easy to Use - No technical knowledge needed
4. Reliable Support - Dedicated success team
5. Proven Results - 500+ satisfied gym owners
